title: Publicly Traded Korean Firm Neowiz To Build Games on Avalanche Network
description: Intella X, Neowiz’s Web3 arm, has joined Avalanche Arcad3 to build blockchain games in the crazed market.

title: Best Tokens To Buy Today for the Long-Term: FLOKI (FLOKI), Gala Games (GALA) and Pomerdoge (POMD)
description: Price volatility usually throws up different types of reactions from investors. For some traders, it is a pointer to consolidate their position and put themselves in good stead with huge gains. For some, it is a moment of anxiety and panic, particularly if their investment seems to be going down the drain.    That’s why [...]
